```{r}

site.num<-hyp1_sites$site_no

site.readings<-1:22

site.data<-1:22

RBI<-1:22


for (i in range(1,22)){

site.readings[i] <- readNWISuv( 
  site = site.num[i], 
  parameterCd = c("00060","99133"),
  startDate = "", 
  endDate = ""
  ) %>% 
  renameNWISColumns()

#write.csv(JACKdischarge, file = "/Users/ethanready/ENV322_group_project/JACKdischarge.csv")

site.data[i]<- readNWISsite(site = site.num[i])
catchment.size <- site.data[i]$drain_area_va

RBI[i] <- (
   sum(abs(diff(site.readings[i]$Flow_Inst))) / 
    sum(site.readings[i]$Flow_Inst[-1])
   / catchment.size)

}
```
